thread.title: The 21 Most Consequential Clinton Scandals | Opinion - Conservative
thread.title_full: The 21 Most Consequential Clinton Scandals | Opinion - Conservative

author: beforeitsnews.com
title: The 21 Most Consequential Clinton Scandals | Opinion - Conservative
text:
(Before It's News)
So many scandals have been associated with the Clintons over the years that it is hard to remember them all. The Washington Times narrows them down to the 21 most consequential:
1. Monica Lewinsky
2. Benghazi
3. Asia fundraising scandal
4. Hillary’s private emails
5. Whitewater
6. Travelgate
7. Humagate
8. Pardongate
9. Foundation favors
10. Mysterious files
11. Filegate
12. Hubble trouble
13. The Waco tragedy
14. The Clinton’s Swedish slush fund
15. Troopergate
16. Gennifer Flowers
17. Bill’s Golden Tongue
18. Boeing Bucks
19. Larry Lawrence
20. The cattle futures
21. Chinagate
See the source for short summaries.
Incredibly, even now the liberal establishment is willing to put these irresponsible criminals in charge of the country. Integrity is a meaningless concept to our ruling class.
Corruption incarnate. On a tip from Artfldgr.
